title: Admin Assistant (Excel Expert)
job_overview:
IMPORTANT: READ BEFORE YOU APPLY. APPLICATIONS WITHOUT ATTACHED RESUMES/CVs WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED.
INCLUDE IN YOUR APPLICATION A VOCAROO/ LOOM LINK INTRODUCING YOURSELF AND YOUR WORK EXPERIENCE

Job Description:
We are looking for a highly organized Administrative Assistant with strong Excel skills and excellent English communication abilities. The role involves supporting our sales and operations teams through data management, CRM updates, internal coordination, and administrative reporting.

Key Responsibilities:

Create, maintain, and analyze spreadsheets for lead tracking and performance reports
Support CRM data entry and pipeline updates (Salesforce preferred)
Coordinate with sales and marketing teams to assist with campaign tasks
Prepare client communications, reports, and documentation
Organize internal files, schedules, and meeting support

Qualifications:

Proficient to advanced in Microsoft Excel (formulas, pivot tables, data validation, etc.)
Excellent verbal and written English communication skills
Previous experience in an administrative, virtual assistant, or support role
Detail-oriented, organized, and able to work independently
Familiarity with CRM tools such as Salesforce is a plus
Stable internet connection and ability to work remotely full-time
